0.code:
% Facts
male(john).
male(james).

% Rules
brother(X, Y) :- male(X), male(Y), X \= Y.

% Queries
%? brother(john, Who).
%? brother(james, Who).

1.code:
% Define some basic math facts
sum(X, Y, Z) :- Z is X + Y.
product(X, Y, Z) :- Z is X * Y.

% Queries to test
%? sum(10, 5, What).
%? product(6, 7, What).

2.code:
% Facts about lists
member(X, [X|_]).
member(X, [_|T]) :- member(X, T).

% Queries to test
%? member(3, [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]).
%? member(X, [a, b, c, d]).
